vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS17-010: Security Update for Microsoft Windows SMB Server (4013389) (ETERNALBLUE) (ETERNALCHAMPION) (ETERNALROMANCE) (ETERNALSYNERGY) (WannaCry) (EternalRocks) (Petya)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Windows host is missing security update 4013389. It is, therefore, affected by multiple vulnerabilities in the Microsoft Server Message Block 1.0 (SMBv1) server.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply Microsoft security update 4013389.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS16-075: Security Update for Windows SMB Server (3164038) (uncredentialed check)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Windows host is missing security update 3164038. It is, therefore, affected by a remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft Server Message Block (SMB) server.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply Microsoft security update 3164038.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Apache HTTP Server 2.4.x < 2.4.51 Multiple Vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.description: The version of Apache HTTP Server installed on the remote host is prior to 2.4.51. It is, therefore, affected by multiple vulnerabilities including a buffer overflow that could lead to remote code execution.
vulnerabilities.solution: Upgrade to Apache HTTP Server version 2.4.51 or later.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: SSL Certificate Signed Using Weak Hashing Algorithm
vulnerabilities.description: The remote service uses an SSL certificate that has been signed using a cryptographically weak hashing algorithm (e.g., MD2, MD4, MD5, or SHA1).
vulnerabilities.solution: Contact the Certificate Authority to have the certificate reissued with a stronger hashing algorithm such as SHA-256.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 : kernel (RHSA-2022:1975)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 host has packages installed that are affected by multiple vulnerabilities including kernel use-after-free vulnerabilities that could lead to privilege escalation.
vulnerabilities.solution: Update the affected packages via 'yum update'.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: SSH Server CBC Mode Ciphers Enabled
vulnerabilities.description: The SSH server is configured to support Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) encryption. This may allow an attacker to recover the plaintext message from the ciphertext.
vulnerabilities.solution: Contact the vendor or consult product documentation to disable CBC mode cipher encryption, and enable CTR or GCM cipher mode encryption.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Cisco ASA Software Multiple Vulnerabilities (cisco-sa-20190501-asa-ssl-vpn)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) is affected by a vulnerability in the SSL VPN feature that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a reload of the affected device.
vulnerabilities.solution: Upgrade to the relevant fixed version referenced in Cisco bug ID CSCvo06440.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Microsoft Exchange Server Multiple Vulnerabilities (September 2023)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Microsoft Exchange Server is missing security updates. It is, therefore, affected by multiple vulnerabilities including remote code execution vulnerabilities.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply the appropriate security updates for Microsoft Exchange Server.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS20-001: Windows Hyper-V Denial of Service Vulnerability (4532691)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Windows host is missing security update 4532691. It is, therefore, affected by a denial of service vulnerability in Windows Hyper-V.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply Microsoft security update 4532691.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: CentOS 7 : kernel (CESA-2021:4140)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote CentOS Linux 7 host has packages installed that are affected by multiple vulnerabilities including kernel vulnerabilities that could lead to privilege escalation.
vulnerabilities.solution: Update the affected packages via 'yum update'.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Cisco IOS XE Software Web UI Multiple Vulnerabilities (cisco-sa-iosxe-webui-privesc-j22SaA4z)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Cisco device running IOS XE Software is affected by multiple vulnerabilities in the web-based user interface (Web UI) that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to create an account on an affected device with privilege level 15 access.
vulnerabilities.solution: Upgrade to the relevant fixed version referenced in the Cisco Security Advisory.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS : openssl vulnerabilities (USN-5402-1)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Ubuntu 20.04 LTS host has packages installed that are affected by multiple vulnerabilities in OpenSSL including command injection and denial of service vulnerabilities.
vulnerabilities.solution: Update the affected packages via 'apt-get update && apt-get upgrade'.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS21-024: Windows DNS Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (5000803)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Windows host is missing security update 5000803. It is, therefore, affected by a remote code execution vulnerability in Windows DNS Server.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply Microsoft security update 5000803.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS19-005: Vulnerability in Microsoft Office and Microsoft Office Services and Web Apps (4022219)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Windows host is missing security update 4022219. It is, therefore, affected by an information disclosure vulnerability in Microsoft Office.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply Microsoft security update 4022219.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Apache HTTP Server 2.4.x < 2.4.51 Multiple Vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.description: The version of Apache HTTP Server installed on the remote host is prior to 2.4.51. It is, therefore, affected by multiple vulnerabilities including a buffer overflow that could lead to remote code execution.
vulnerabilities.solution: Upgrade to Apache HTTP Server version 2.4.51 or later.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: OS Identification
vulnerabilities.description: Using a combination of remote probes (e.g., TCP/IP stack fingerprinting), it was possible to guess the name of the remote operating system in use.
vulnerabilities.solution: n/a

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops Service Multiple Vulnerabilities (CTX474995)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops Service installation is affected by multiple vulnerabilities including privilege escalation and remote code execution vulnerabilities.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply the relevant updates referenced in Citrix Security Bulletin CTX474995.

vulnerabilities.description: The remote Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 host has packages installed that are affected by multiple vulnerabilities including kernel use-after-free vulnerabilities that could lead to privilege escalation.

vulnerabilities.solution: Update the affected packages via 'apt-get update && apt-get upgrade'.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 : kernel (RHSA-2023:2458)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 host has packages installed that are affected by multiple vulnerabilities including kernel vulnerabilities that could lead to privilege escalation and denial of service.
vulnerabilities.solution: Update the affected packages via 'yum update'.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS : openssl vulnerabilities (USN-5402-1)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Ubuntu 22.04 LTS host has packages installed that are affected by multiple vulnerabilities in OpenSSL including command injection and denial of service vulnerabilities.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS17-010: Security Update for Microsoft Windows SMB Server (4013389) (ETERNALBLUE)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Windows host is missing security update 4013389. Multiple SMB vulnerabilities affect this mail server.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS16-075: Security Update for Windows SMB Server (3164038)
vulnerabilities.description: The remote Windows host is missing security update 3164038 affecting the file server.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: SSH Server CBC Mode Ciphers Enabled
vulnerabilities.description: The SSH server on the application server supports CBC encryption which may be vulnerable to attacks.
vulnerabilities.solution: Configure SSH to use CTR or GCM cipher modes.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: MS22-037: Windows Kernel Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability (5013944)
vulnerabilities.description: The backup server is missing security update 5013944 for Windows kernel vulnerability.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply Microsoft security update 5013944.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: CentOS 7 : kernel (CESA-2021:4140)
vulnerabilities.description: The monitoring server has kernel vulnerabilities that require patching.
vulnerabilities.solution: Update the affected packages via 'yum update'.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: SSH Server CBC Mode Ciphers Enabled
vulnerabilities.description: The development database server SSH configuration uses weak CBC ciphers.
vulnerabilities.solution: Reconfigure SSH to disable CBC mode ciphers.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS : openssl vulnerabilities (USN-5402-1)
